svg.text: Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade (meta EIP7569 )
* Final public testnets upgrade to Dencun Jan 30 (Sepolia) & Feb 7
(Holešky) Lightweight beaconcha.in explorers: mainnet , Holešky &
Sepolia
Final public testnets upgrade to Dencun Jan 30 (Sepolia) & Feb 7
(Holešky)
* Lightweight beaconcha.in explorers: mainnet , Holešky & Sepolia
* L2s testing blobs: RollCall (L2 standards) EIP4844 readiness call
: L2s testing on Goerli or waiting for Sepolia & improving
communications with core devs OP & Base devnets posting batches via
blobs on Goerli testnet Starknet sent state diff blob on Goerli
testnet
L2s testing blobs:
* RollCall (L2 standards) EIP4844 readiness call : L2s testing on
Goerli or waiting for Sepolia & improving communications with core devs
RollCall (L2 standards) EIP4844 readiness call : L2s testing on Goerli
or waiting for Sepolia & improving communications with core devs
* OP & Base devnets posting batches via blobs on Goerli testnet
OP & Base devnets posting batches via blobs on Goerli testnet
* Starknet sent state diff blob on Goerli testnet
Starknet sent state diff blob on Goerli testnet
* Dencun interop testing call video : high memory usage after blob
spamming, max churn limit (EIP7514) will be tested on Goerli and first
blobs expire on Goerli Feb 5
Dencun interop testing call video : high memory usage after blob
spamming, max churn limit (EIP7514) will be tested on Goerli and first
blobs expire on Goerli Feb 5
* EF DevOps Attacknet : chaos testing tooling, plan to open source
after Dencun
EF DevOps Attacknet : chaos testing tooling, plan to open source after
Dencun
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade (meta EIP7600 )
* Latest all core devs – consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from
Christine Kim : Electra upgrade scope (small cross layer fork targeting
late 2024): Client team priorities : Lighthouse , Lodestar & Prysm
Electra EIPs : EIP6110 (validator deposits onchain), EIP7002 (EL
triggerable exits) & EIP7549 (move committee index outside attestation)
Not in Electra : EIP6914 (reuse validator indices) Discussions
ongoing : EIP7251 (increase max effective balance), EIP7547 (inclusion
lists), EIP7594 (PeerDAS) & SSZification EIPs
* Electra upgrade scope (small cross layer fork targeting late 2024):
Client team priorities : Lighthouse , Lodestar & Prysm Electra EIPs :
EIP6110 (validator deposits onchain), EIP7002 (EL triggerable exits) &
EIP7549 (move committee index outside attestation) Not in Electra :
EIP6914 (reuse validator indices) Discussions ongoing : EIP7251
(increase max effective balance), EIP7547 (inclusion lists), EIP7594
(PeerDAS) & SSZification EIPs
Week in Ethereum News
